title: Prototype MVP for MythOS Elite (Blueprint, Founder Twin, Narrative Engine, Decision Simulator)

requirements.text: Create a clickable prototype UI for “MythOS Elite™” with a simple app shell (header + left navigation) and 4 primary sections: Founder Cognitive Blueprint, AI Founder Twin, Narrative Dominance Engine, and Strategic Decision Simulator.

quotes: Can you code it and let me see a prototype

acceptanceCriteria: User can navigate between the 4 sections without page reload.
Each section has an overview panel describing what it does using the user-provided language (in English).
App renders without placeholder/blank routes (no dead links).

requirements.text: Implement a coherent, premium visual theme suitable for an elite founder product (distinct typography, neutral palette, strong contrast, restrained accents) and apply it consistently across navigation, cards, forms, and outputs (avoid blue/purple as primary accents).

quotes: The Cognitive Infrastructure System for High-Level Founders
Can you code it and let me see a prototype

acceptanceCriteria: UI uses a consistent design system (spacing, card styles, button variants) across all 4 modules.
Primary accent color is not blue or purple.
All pages are responsive and usable at mobile and desktop widths.

requirements.text: Founder Cognitive Blueprint module: build a guided multi-step intake that captures the founder traits listed by the user (strategic heuristics, risk tolerance model, moral decision thresholds, crisis response patterns, shadow traits, long-term worldview, competitive instinct structure, communication cadence). Save progress and generate a “Founder Doctrine Manual” as a structured long-form text output.

quotes:
Founder Cognitive Blueprint™

A deep-dive extraction process that maps:
	•	Strategic heuristics
	•	Risk tolerance model
	•	Moral decision thresholds
	•	Crisis response patterns
	•	Shadow traits
	•	Long-term worldview
	•	Competitive instinct structure
	•	Communication cadence

Output:
A 100–300 page internal Founder Doctrine Manual.

acceptanceCriteria: User can complete an intake and see a generated Doctrine Manual preview immediately after submission.
User can save a draft intake and return to it within the same browser session (and via backend persistence for the prototype).
Generated manual includes clearly labeled sections corresponding to each captured trait area and incorporates user-entered content.
User can export/download the manual as a .txt or .md file from the UI.

requirements.text: AI Founder Twin module: provide an artifact ingestion UI for text inputs and file uploads (stored as text content where feasible) for founder interviews, past emails, strategic memos, and public statements. Provide a “Draft” workspace that generates a founder-style response to a prompt using deterministic, local heuristics (no external LLM/API).

quotes:
AI Founder Twin™

Not a chatbot.

A calibrated cognitive simulation trained on:
	•	Founder interviews
	•	Past emails
	•	Strategic memos
	•	Public statements
	•	Stress reactions
	•	Real-time decision modeling

Use cases:

• Draft board memos
• Evaluate investment opportunities
• Simulate PR fallout
• Test negotiation strategies
• Maintain consistent brand philosophy
• Preserve legacy

acceptanceCriteria: User can add, list, and delete ingested artifacts in the prototype.

User can enter a prompt and receive a generated output that references: (a) selected doctrine traits and (b) patterns extracted from uploaded artifacts (e.g., preferred tone, recurring principles) using transparent, non-LLM logic.
UI supports at least three preset drafting modes: “Board Memo”, “Investment Evaluation”, “PR Fallout Simulation”, each producing different structured output sections.
The app clearly labels the feature as a prototype simulation without claiming external AI model training or real-time market access.

requirements.text: Narrative Dominance Engine module: implement structured workflows to produce outputs for (1) public identity positioning, (2) strategic controversy arcs, (3) media angles, (4) long-term cultural narrative placement, and (5) adversary positioning strategy. Allow selecting a target audience and constraints, then generate a narrative “playbook” document.

quotes:
Narrative Dominance Engine™

We engineer:
	•	Public identity positioning
	•	Strategic controversy arcs
	•	Media angles
	•	Long-term cultural narrative placement
	•	Adversary positioning strategy

This isn’t PR.
It’s legend architecture.

acceptanceCriteria: User can fill a form and generate a playbook output with separate sections for each of the five items above.
User can save multiple playbooks and revisit them from a list view.
User can export/download a playbook as .txt or .md.

requirements.text: Strategic Decision Simulator module: implement scenario setup for major founder decisions (launch product, acquire competitor, fire executive, enter new political space) with inputs for assumptions (market, behavioral, historical reaction patterns as user-entered parameters). Compute and display a probabilistic outcome summary using a transparent scoring model and show 2–5 scenario branches with rationale.

quotes:
Strategic Decision Simulator™

Before a founder makes a move:
	•	Launch new product?
	•	Acquire competitor?
	•	Fire executive?
	•	Enter new political space?

The system runs probabilistic scenario modeling based on:

Market data
Behavioral forecasting
Historical reaction patterns

acceptanceCriteria: User can choose a decision type, enter assumptions, and run the simulator.
Simulator displays: (a) overall success probability, (b) key drivers (top contributing factors), (c) scenario branches with outcomes and suggested mitigations.
User can save simulator runs and compare at least two runs side-by-side (inputs + results).

requirements.text: Backend (single Motoko actor): add stable persistence for the prototype entities needed by all modules (Blueprint drafts + manuals, Artifact library, Twin drafts, Narrative playbooks, Simulator runs) with CRUD methods callable from the frontend.

quotes: Can you code it and let me see a prototype

acceptanceCriteria: Data created in each module persists across page reloads.
CRUD calls are exposed via the generated canister interface and are used by the frontend via the existing actor hook pattern (without editing immutable hook files).
All stored records include an id, createdAt timestamp, and updatedAt timestamp.

requirements.text: Frontend data layer: integrate React Query for loading/mutating the backend entities for each module, including loading states, empty states, and error states.

quotes: Can you code it and let me see a prototype

acceptanceCriteria: Each module list/detail view shows a skeleton or loading indicator during fetch.
Mutations (create/update/delete) optimistically update or refetch and reflect changes immediately.
Errors are shown as user-friendly English messages with a retry action where appropriate.

requirements.text: Add an in-app “Demo Data” action that seeds the prototype with one example Blueprint + Doctrine Manual, a small set of artifacts, one Narrative playbook, and two Simulator runs so the user can explore the experience instantly.
acceptanceCriteria: User can click “Load Demo Data” and see populated lists across all modules.
Seeding is idempotent (re-running does not create duplicates).
Demo content is clearly marked as sample content in the UI.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable by the platform; compose them instead.
Do not integrate external AI/LLM providers; AI Founder Twin behavior must be implemented as a deterministic prototype (rules/templates/scoring) using user-provided inputs only.
User-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: True AI model training or ingestion pipelines beyond simple prototype storage and deterministic generation.
Real-time market data integrations or external data sources for the simulator.
Producing an actual 100–300 page PDF; the prototype may generate long-form text and allow .txt/.md export.

required: Minimal wordmark logo on transparent background (mythos-elite-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
Abstract premium dashboard hero illustration with neutral tones and subtle gold accent (mythos-elite-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of 4 monochrome module icons (blueprint, twin, narrative, simulator) (mythos-elite-module-icons.dim_512x512.png)
